
# named-function v1.0.3 [![locked](http://badges.github.io/stability-badges/dist/locked.svg)](http://github.com/badges/stability-badges)

```sh
npm install --save named-function
```

with named-function
-------------------

CoffeeScript:

```CoffeeScript
NamedFunction = require "named-function"
Rectangle = NamedFunction "Rectangle", (@width, @height) ->
```

JavaScript:

```JavaScript
var NamedFunction = require("named-function")
var Rectangle = NamedFunction("Rectangle", function (width, height) {
  this.width = width
  this.height = height
})
```

without named-function
----------------------

CoffeeScript:

```CoffeeScript
# Impossible in CoffeeScript.
```

JavaScript:

```JavaScript
var Rectangle = (function () {
  return function Rectangle (width, height) {
    this.width = width
    this.height = height
  }
})()
```
